definition: Eupatorium, e.g. Japanese bog orchid (Eupatorium japonicum Thunb)
pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: Finally, we simulated and predicted the spatial distribution pattern of this invasive plant.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對紫莖澤蘭的空間分佈格局進行了模擬和預測。

sentences.english: Gravel Root tones the reproductive tract and is used to treat inflammation of the prostate.
sentences.chinese: 粉綠莖澤蘭有調理生殖系統和治療前列腺發炎的作用。

sentences.english: This paper reports for the experimental study of continuous methane fermentation by using Eupatorium adenophorum Spreng.
sentences.chinese: 研究了紫莖澤蘭預處後沼氣連續發酵的產氣潛力。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the chemical constituents of essential oil in Eupatorium adenophorum.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究紫荊澤蘭揮發油的化學成分。

sentences.english: Toxicant eupatorium adenophorum spreng can be used as a feedstuff after methane fermented.
sentences.chinese: 毒性紫莖澤蘭經預處理並沼氣發酵後，能製成飼料。

sentences.english: Conclusion The major chemical constituents of essential oil in Eupatorium adenophorum are terpenes.
sentences.chinese: 結論紫荊澤蘭揮發油的主要化學成分爲萜類化合物。

sentences.english: Epatorium adenophorum Spreng is a poisonous, aggressive quarantine weed.
sentences.chinese: 紫莖澤蘭是一種有毒的，侵佔性很強的檢疫性雜草。
